> <OLD>
>
> Hydras lookignt o his eam said "Set the alarms in the shuttle and lock it
> down, We will travel together, keep your blasters ready for any unmpleasant
> surprice and keep your eyes open"
>
> Hydras looked the barren land and frowned but slowly started to walk, following
> Skyshadow's last know track.

Several of the fuzors locked the shuttle down, locking the doors and
setting the alarms within. Hopefuylly this would be enough to protect
the shuttle from would be thieves.

As Hydras set out with his band of Predacons in search of Skyshadow,
it is easy for him to see by the direction of the scanners that his
captured Predacons had been taken almost directly to the city. Every
scan showed the path leading in that direction.

As the band continued to move forward the ground continued to get more
and more barren. The few trees and scrub brush that had been present
near the shuttle's landing area wee totally gone as they travelled in
towards the city. The air itself became progressively darker and
gloomier as the ever present smog appeared to be almost blocking out
the sun.

Approximately halfway to the city Hydras could see the city itself
more clearly. He could see the gate that granted entry to it, as well
as the guards that protected it. However what was more troubling was
what appeared to be several tanks that came through the gate and began
travelling in the direction that Hydras was travelling, thier powerful
treads leaving small plumes of ground up dust behind them as they
travelled. They appeared to be on an intercept course with Hydras.

(TAG)

Preston
